tool_input.command:
git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
feat: update admin proxy API calls with pagination support

- Replaced /v1/proxies/sample with paginated /v1/proxies?page=1&limit=200 in Dashboard.tsx
- Added totalProxies state to handle API total count
- Verified and aligned KPI calls to /v1/proxies/count and /v1/proxies/stats
- Enhanced API controllers with Swagger decorators for MCP compatibility
- Added OpenAPI setup in main.ts with tags for proxies/providers/webhooks

Closes issue 11
🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"
tool_input.description: Commit staged changes with descriptive message
